text: Pen Lom binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak okok, chɨnop apebal agel nɨŋɨd, ogɨnap apɨl chɨnop Apiyus Maket nab ak nebeŋ pakɨlak. Pen ogɨnap apɨl chɨnop nebeŋ pakɨlak, bɨ okok nɨb okok nɨb kɨnɨbal kal omɨŋal nokom yek man ak. Pen chɨnop apɨl nebeŋ pakɨlak tek, Pol kɨlop nɨŋɨd, chɨbol nop ak tep gek, God nop tep agak.
